data.title: 0 whitewash win over South Africa: 3rd T20 (Tarouba) :: The largest library of cricket videos
data.meta_description:
Shai Hope blasted 42 not out in 24 balls as the West Indies romped to an eight-wicket victory over South Africa in a rain-disrupted match to complete a 3-0 series win.
Tristan Stubbs hit 40 as South Africa scored 108-4 off 13 overs. Romario Shepherd took 2-14 to be named player of the match.
West Indies were left with a victory target of 116 under the Duckworth Lewis method. Hope and Nicholas Pooran (35 off just 13 deliveries) laid the foundation for the hosts' victory.
West Indies 116 for 2 (Hope 42*, Pooran 35, Fortuin 1-8) beat South Africa 108 for 4 (Stubbs 40, Shepherd 2-14) by eight wickets via DLS method.
Aug 2024.
